0: Server=kyoo-backend-postgres-17-rw.media.svc; Database=kyoo-backend; Username=kyoo-backend; SSLMode=VerifyCA; RootCertificate=/certs/root-ca/ca.crt; SSLCertificate=/certs/postgres/user/tls.crt; SSLKey=/certs/postgres/user/tls.key; Pooling=true; MinPoolSize=2; Maximum Pool Size=20;

Server=kyoo-backend-postgres-17-rw.media.svc; Database=kyoo-backend; Username=kyoo-backend; SSLMode=VerifyCA; RootCertificate=/certs/root-ca/ca.crt; SSLCertificate=/certs/postgres/user/tls.crt; SSLKey=/certs/postgres/user/tls.key; Pooling=true; MinPoolSize=2; Maximum Pool Size=20;

apex coredns-k8s-gateway.networking
ttl 300
resources Ingress Service HTTPRoute TLSRoute
gatewayClasses internal-gateways

cp /config/cookies.txt /config/cookies-rw.txt
ytdl-sub --log-level=debug --config=/config/config.yaml sub /media/youtube/subscriptions.yaml
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixing permissions, started at $$(date --rfc-2822)"
find $${MEDIA_FOLDER} -user root -exec chown 568:568 "{}" \; -exec chmod 777 "{}" \;
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixed permissions, ended at $$(date --rfc-2822)"
